Class.ClassComment:
TopologyChanged /** * This annotation should be used on methods that need to be notified when the {@link ConsistentHash} implementationin use by the {@link DistributionManager} changes due to a change in cluster topology. This is only firedin a {@link Configuration.CacheMode#DIST_SYNC} or {@link Configuration.CacheMode#DIST_ASYNC} configured cache.

Methods annotated with this annotation should accept a single parameter, a {@link TopologyChangedEvent} otherwise a{@link IncorrectListenerException} will be thrown when registering your listener.

Note that methods marked with this annotation will be fired before and after the updated {@link ConsistentHash}is installed, i.e., your method will be called twice, with {@link Event#isPre()} being set to true as wellas false.

* @author Manik Surtani * @see org.infinispan.notifications.Listener * @since 5.0 */
